attributes.action: Provide our troops quickly with plenty of better tanks & vehicles to save precious lives
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Our heroic troops risk their lives every day.Too many are being killed or seriously injured due to the lack of decent tanks & other vehicles & weapons.In this day & age we have the ability to supply them but money isnt being spent to provide them. This is a disgusting & shameful situation.So many lives can be saved if they were made a priority.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
